About Me
I am an MBA candidate at University Canada West with interests in
operations, digital transformation, and data-driven decision making.
This portfolio highlights selected coursework, projects, and skills that
demonstrate my analytical thinking, collaboration, and communication.

title: Resume
text:
Professional Summary
My background is in media and marketing. My career started as marketing officer with enhacing hands-on experience on branding, plan campaign, and customer engagement. Currently through pursuing MBA, I am exploring to creative marketing insights with analytical and strategic decision making to support business growth and innovation.
